price: 120. Hubaal Ibraahiim wuxuu ahaa hoggaamiye lagu daydo, adeeca Alle, ka leexsan (diimaha gurracan oo dhan)29, mana aheyn mid ka mid ah Mushrikiinta.
arabic: إِنَّ إِبۡرَٰهِيمَ كَانَ أُمَّةٗ قَانِتٗا لِّلَّهِ حَنِيفٗا وَلَمۡ يَكُ مِنَ ٱلۡمُشۡرِكِينَ
footnotes: 29. Waa leh dhammaan tilmaamaha wanaagsan ee ka yeeli karta qofka tusaale lagu daydo uu wax ku hoggaamiyo.

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: inna ib'rāhīma kāna ummatan qānitan lillahi ḥanīfan walam yaku mina al-mush'rikīna
